ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Stacking?
ygData.msgSnippet: Check out the numerous threads on the message boards at: www.attcanada.net/~reaper they basically fubar d bards in the high end game, causing epic and lute of
ygData.messageBody:
Check out the numerous threads on the message boards at:
www.attcanada.net/~reaper

they basically fubar'd bards in the high end game, causing epic and lute
of the howler and other effects to not stack, while not addressing the
problem they stated, which was double stacking buffs and/or damage
shields on bards.

MacGrough Mich'Rathe
Solusek Ro Obsidian Fear


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Egelhof, Tobias [mailto:tobias.egelhof@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, September 25, 2001 7:33 AM
> To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: AW: [eqbards] Bard Stacking?
>
> no idea...
>
> there was some issues with stacking songs and some epic effects if i
> remember correctly. but in fact, i do not =)
>
> anyone has more information on this?
>
> tobi
>
> -----Urspr├╝ngliche Nachricht-----
> Von: Drewt Drumslinger [mailto:drewt@...]
> Gesendet am: Dienstag, 25. September 2001 14:24

> Betreff: [eqbards] Bard Stacking?
>
> 9/25 3:00AM Patch
>
> ** Spell Changes **
>
> - We have removed the changes to bard song stacking that were made
with
> the
> recent emergency patch. We will be reviewing those changes for
possible
> update
> in a future patch.
>
> What the...., Did I miss something??
>
